cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's atai

sentence.kanji: xの値を求めなさい。
sentence.romaji: ekusu no atai wo motomenasai
sentence.english: Calculate the value of x.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kashidashi

sentence.kanji: その本は貸し出ししていません。
sentence.romaji: sono hon ha kashidashi shite imasen
sentence.english: That book can't be checked out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitogomi

sentence.kanji: 私は人込みが好きではありません。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hitogomi ga suki de ha arimasen
sentence.english: I don't like crowds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitorihitori

sentence.kanji: この学校では一人一人の生徒を大切にしているの。
sentence.romaji: kono gakou de ha hitorihitori no seito wo taisetsu ni shite iru no
sentence.english: Each individual student is valued in this school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neage

sentence.kanji: バス代が値上げされました。
sentence.romaji: basudai ga neage saremashita
sentence.english: Bus fares were raised.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daikin

sentence.kanji: ここで代金をお支払いください。
sentence.romaji: koko de daikin wo o shiharai kudasai
sentence.english: Please pay the bill here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teikyuubi

sentence.kanji: この店は水曜が定休日です。
sentence.romaji: kono mise ha suiyou ga teikyuubi desu
sentence.english: This shop is closed on Wednesdays.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's unchin

sentence.kanji: 鉄道の運賃が値上げされたね。
sentence.romaji: tetsudou no unchin ga neage sareta ne
sentence.english: Train fares have gone up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ataisuru

sentence.kanji: その絵は一見に値しますよ。
sentence.romaji: sono e ha iken ni atai shimasu yo
sentence.english: That painting is worth a look.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neuchi

sentence.kanji: この絵はとても値打ちがあります。
sentence.romaji: kono e ha totemo neuchi ga arimasu
sentence.english: This painting is very valuable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daitai

sentence.kanji: 大体、初めから無理な計画だったのだ。
sentence.romaji: daitai hajime kara muri na keikaku data no da
sentence.english: To be fair, it was a far-fetched plan from the beginning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinrui

sentence.kanji: 人類は2本の足で歩きます。
sentence.romaji: jinrui ha nihon no ashi de arukimasu
sentence.english: Humans walk on two feet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsunai

sentence.kanji: 雨の日は子供を室内で遊ばせます。
sentence.romaji: ame no hi ha kodomo wo shitsunai de asobasemasu
sentence.english: I have the kids play indoors on rainy days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tayori

sentence.kanji: 月に一度母から便りが来ます。
sentence.romaji: tsuki ni ichido haha kara tayori ga kimasu
sentence.english: I get a letter from my mother once a month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's geshuku

sentence.kanji: 親類の家に4年間下宿しました。
sentence.romaji: shinrui no ie ni yonenkan geshuku shimashita
sentence.english: I boarded at a relative's house for four years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuusoku

sentence.kanji: 休息をとることは大切です。
sentence.romaji: kyuusoku wo toru koto ha taisetsu desu
sentence.english: It's important to take breaks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tairyoku

sentence.kanji: 若者は体力がありますね。
sentence.romaji: wakamono ha tairyoku ga arimasu ne
sentence.english: Young people have a lot of stamina.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sedai

sentence.kanji: 私は彼と同じ世代です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare to onaji sedai desu
sentence.english: I am of the same generation as him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuujin

sentence.kanji: 彼は求人広告で仕事を見つけたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyuujin koukoku de shigoto wo mitsuketa n da
sentence.english: He found a job through a recruiting ad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiageru

sentence.kanji: 彼はやっと報告書を仕上げたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yato houkokusho wo shiageta yo
sentence.english: He finally finished up the report.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kashi

sentence.kanji: 彼には貸しがあるの。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha kashi ga aru no
sentence.english: He owes me one.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuujin

sentence.kanji: 彼は高校時代からの友人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha koukou jidai kara no yuujin desu
sentence.english: He's my old friend from high school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taishi

sentence.kanji: 彼は昔、ドイツの大使でした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mukashi doitsu no taishi deshita
sentence.english: He was ambassador to Germany a long time ago.

cards.english: back of one's mind, one's real intention
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naishin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は内心どきどきしていましたよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha naishin dokidoki shite imashita yo
sentence.english: Inside, her heart was pounding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taikaku

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても体格がいいわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo taikaku ga ii wa
sentence.english: He has a very nice body.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nande

sentence.kanji: 彼女は何で来ないんだろう。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha nande konain darou
sentence.english: I wonder why she hasn't come.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's negiru

sentence.kanji: 彼は値切るのが上手です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha negiru no ga jouzu desu
sentence.english: He's good at haggling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sonouchi

sentence.kanji: 彼女もその内、親の気持ちが分かるだろう。
sentence.romaji: kanojo mo sonouchi oya no kimochi ga wakaru darou
sentence.english: Sooner or later, she'll come to understand her parents' feelings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanishiro

sentence.kanji: 彼は何しろよくしゃべります。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nanishiro yoku shaberimasu
sentence.english: Anyway, he talks a lot.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanto

sentence.kanji: 何と彼らは結婚したそうです。
sentence.romaji: nanto karera ha kekon shita sou desu
sentence.english: I heard that they got married.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukai

sentence.kanji: 主人の使いで市役所に行くところです。
sentence.romaji: shujin no tsukai de shiyakusho ni iku tokoro desu
sentence.english: I'm about to go to city hall on an errand for my husband.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiage

sentence.kanji: 彼は論文の仕上げに入ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ronbun no shiage ni haita no
sentence.english: He entered the final stages of the thesis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitode

sentence.kanji: 人手が足りなくて忙しい。
sentence.romaji: hitode ga tarinakute isogashii
sentence.english: We're busy because we lack manpower.

cards.english: give a rest, set at ease
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasumeru

sentence.kanji: 疲れた体を休めてください。
sentence.romaji: tsukareta karada wo yasumete kudasai
sentence.english: Please rest your weary bones.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tamotsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は若さを保とうと必死だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha wakasa wo tamotou to hishi da
sentence.english: She's desperately trying to retain her youth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshou

sentence.kanji: この製品の保証期間は5年間となっております。
sentence.romaji: kono seihin no hoshou kikan ha 5 nen kan to nate orimasu
sentence.english: The guarantee period of this product is five years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hoshounin

sentence.kanji: 彼が私の保証人になってくれました。
sentence.romaji: kare ga watashi no hoshounin ni nate kuremashita
sentence.english: He became my guarantor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hozon

sentence.kanji: データを30分おきに保存してください。
sentence.romaji: de-ta wo 30 pun oki ni hozon shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please save data every 30 minutes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitai

sentence.kanji: 公園で死体が見つかったの。
sentence.romaji: kouen de shitai ga mitsukata no
sentence.english: A corpse was found in the park.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitode

sentence.kanji: 今日も遊園地は大変な人出だったよ。
sentence.romaji: kyou mo yuuenchi ha taihen na hitode data yo
sentence.english: The amusement park was very crowded too today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seijin

sentence.kanji: 娘が今年成人します。
sentence.romaji: musume ga kotoshi seijin shimasu
sentence.english: My daughter comes of age this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakushin

sentence.kanji: 私は彼の成功を確信しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no seikou wo kakushin shite imasu
sentence.english: I am convinced of his success.

cards.english: somehow or other, one way or another
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nantoka

sentence.kanji: 何とかお願いします。
sentence.romaji: nantoka onegai shimasu
sentence.english: I beg you to take care of it.

cards.english: sitting upright with legs folded under one
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiza

sentence.kanji: 彼はきちんと正座して待っていたね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kichinto seiza shite mate ita ne
sentence.english: He waited while sitting properly on the floor, Japanese style.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taichou

sentence.kanji: 今日は体調が悪いです。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha taichou ga warui desu
sentence.english: I feel sick today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daiben

sentence.kanji: 病院で大便の検査をした。
sentence.romaji: byouin de daiben no kensa wo shita
sentence.english: I had a stool examination at the hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's renkyuu

sentence.kanji: 今度の連休は実家に帰ります。
sentence.romaji: kondo no renkyuu ha jika ni kaerimasu
sentence.english: I'll go back to my parents' house for the next consecutive holidays.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shutai

sentence.kanji: 政治は国民主体であるべきです。
sentence.romaji: seiji ha kokumin shutai de aru beki desu
sentence.english: The government should be the agent of the people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisei

sentence.kanji: 政治の体制を変える必要があります。
sentence.romaji: seiji no taisei wo kaeru hitsuyou ga arimasu
sentence.english: It's necessary to change the political system.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furitsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は府立大学に通っています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha furitsu daigaku ni kayote imasu
sentence.english: She goes to the prefectural university.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishin

sentence.kanji: あの人の顔には自信があふれているね。
sentence.romaji: ano hito no kao ni ha jishin ga afurete iru ne
sentence.english: That person's face is brimming with confidence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nantonaku

sentence.kanji: パーティーに行くのは何となく気が進まないな。
sentence.romaji: pa-tei- ni iku no ha nantonaku ki ga susumanai na
sentence.english: Somehow I don't feel like going to the party.
